intro.description: Here you will learn how to deal with SVN in the IDE. You can configure some repositories and import the projects you need

item.title: Open SVN Perspective
item.description: First of all, we need to open the SVN Perspective using the menu "Window->Perspective->Open Perspective->Other" and select "SVN Perspective"

item.title: Add a new Repository
item.description: In the "SVN Repositories" view, right click there and click on "New->Repository Location" menu

subitem.label: Fill the URL field and click on Finish. If the URL is valid, the repository will be added automatically

item.title: Import an existing Project into the Workspace
item.description: Browse the added repository and select the folder you want to import. Right click on it and select "Checkout" action. Follow the steps in the wizard in order to create a new Project (if the folder is not an Eclipse Project) or import it (if the folder is yet an Eclipse Project)
